title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 641.2 - Designation of employees who shall enforce article 33 of the environmental conservation law and those portions of article 15 dealing with the use of chemicals in water
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 641.2 - Designation of employees who shall enforce article 33 of the environmental conservation law and those portions of article 15 dealing with the use of chemicals in water

State Regulations

Employees of the Department of Environmental Conservation
having the titles of pesticide control inspector, senior pesticide control
inspector or supervising pesticide control inspector are designated to enforce
the provisions of article 33 and section
15-0313 (4)
of the

Environmental Conservation Law, and the rules, regulations and orders enacted
or promulgated thereunder, as provided by section
71-0201
of the Environmental

Conservation Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
641.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
